goal: Implement comprehensive test coverage and cleanup for ServiceTitan CRM integration workflows
summary: Implement comprehensive test coverage and cleanup for ServiceTitan CRM integration workflows

fields.who: ServiceTitan workflows (Auth Token Manager, Call Association, Job Reminder, Review Request)
fields.what: Clean artifacts, expand test coverage, update documentation, enforce governance rules
fields.when: Ongoing maintenance until [DEV] tags removed after 98%+ evaluation threshold
fields.why: Project had stale Windows artifacts, tests in wrong locations, outdated documentation
fields.how: 1. Moved Windows artifacts to old/ 2. Reorganized tests to proper structure 3. Updated project.md status 4. Created 42 new tests for core logic using Vitest
fields.lest: Stale files accumulate causing confusion, tests fail to run in CI pipelines, documentation becomes misleading and outdated
fields.with: Vitest test framework, n8n cloud workflows, ServiceTitan API, bun runtime
fields.measuredBy: 60 tests passing with 100% success rate, clean project structure, accurate documentation
